en.content: After another few moments, May glances round at you. Then you hear the soft scratch of a match being lit. She applies it to something in the grate and tiptoes from the room.
Once you hear her bedroom door, you creep to the grate. A small mound of black powder, no bigger than a thimble, is burning there. It gives off heady fumes.

text.content: You may make a Hard Science (Botany) roll.

zh.content: 又过了几秒钟，梅环顾四周，瞟了你几眼。然后，你听到了火柴轻轻划燃的声音。她把火柴丢到壁炉里的什么东西上，踮着脚出了房间。
你听到她的卧室门关上以后，马上悄悄摸到壁炉前。壁炉里面点着一小堆黑色粉末，最多只有顶针大小。它散发出令人陶醉的烟气。

text.content: 你可以进行一次困难难度的「科学（生物学）」检定。

text.en: Relax and breathe the fumes out of curiosit
text.zh: 放松下来，好奇地吸一口烟气
